page.title: 13JOANNE'S DAY
page.content: { {Susan,Clare and I}tried to catch {butterflies}but we didn't do very well. We had competitions to see who could do the best{handstands.}After that we played on the{slide.}Then it was time for lunch.I went home and had some sandwiches.Clare,Susan and I played on {rollerboots}at Clare's house. Afterwards I went home and had tea then I{read}for a bit.Susan,Clare and I then played{football,}we played on the{wall}after that.While Clare was having her tea Susan and I went to my house.When Clare came round we watched the Price is Right for a bit then Clare and Susan{went home.} Later I went to {bed.}
